content: ock r g y o b l e a m b crochet pattern handmade by nikelle notes keep an eye out for anything in red font these are the easy-to-miss/important sections of the pattern we will be working in a continuous spiral a stitch marker is recommended to form a magic_ring with blanket yarn i chain 2 and use the 2nd chain from hook as my magic ring use whichever method you would like abbreviations materials us terminology magic_ring magic_ring -crochet hook round round -yarn of choice fo fasten_off green blo back loop only grey st stitch -tapestry needle chain chain -scissors slip_stitch slip_stitch -stitch marker s single_crochet single_crochet -fiber fill increase increase -safety eyes in decrease decrease desired size *…* repeat between -see the next image # stitch count for everything i used copyright this pattern is for personal use only you may not sell copy translate or distribute any part of this pattern you may sell any items made from it my materials materials are really up to you as long as you have a crochet hook s that can give you tight stitches you can use any yarn you prefer i m not going to include what hook size i use because it is irrelevant to your project trust yourself to find the right hook size for your gauge premier basix chenille brights pewter and kiwi/caribbean if you order from their website using this link i earn a small commission no pressure 20mm safety eyes you might have to play around with placement if you use different size eyes/your project ends up bigger or smaller than mine your notes this is the place to write down any adjustments you have to make or any special notes for yourself to remember for next time print this page for other projects as well y a r n h o o k s a d j u s t m e n t s / n o t e s arms arm 1 -start with grey -i do not stuff either arm but feel free to round 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 round 2 blo *2 single_crochet decrease* x2 6 round 3 6 single_crochet 6 change to green on last st round 4 6 single_crochet 6 round 5 press round 4 together and work 3 single_crochet through lined up sts to close 3 -fo leaving a small tail to secure or crochet over later arm 2 -start with green round 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 round 2 blo *2 single_crochet decrease* x2 6 change to grey on last st round 3-4 2 rnds 6 single_crochet 6 round 5 press round 4 together and work 3 single_crochet through lined up sts to close 3 -fo leaving a small tail to secure or crochet over later arm 2 arm 1 arm 2 arm 1 legs legs x2 -start with grey round 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 round 2 blo *2 single_crochet decrease* x2 6 -fo leg 1 leaving a
